name: BLOCK-T240
configuration_schema:
$schema: http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#
title: BLOCK-T240 configuration
description: Configuration for BLOCK-T240.
type: object
properties:
  az:
    description: Azimuth position
    type: number
    default: 153
  start_el:
    description: Starting elevation position
    type: number
    default: 80
  end_el:
    description: Final El position
    type: number
    default: 40
  ignore:
    description: Name of the CSCs we want to ignore
    type: array
    default: []
  settings_sets:
    description: List of TMA settings sets to be applied
    type: array
    default: []
  reset_default_settings:
    description: Reset all the TMA settings to default
    type: boolean
    default: false
